SEARCH
Package gw.api.iso

Class ISOPayloadGenerator

java.lang.Object
gw.api.iso.ISOPayloadGenerator
public class ISOPayloadGenerator extends Object
Deprecated.
use the new Gosu ISO payload generation infrastructure, also in the gw.api.iso package, but based around ISOClaimSearchRequestBase and ISOLossSectionBase. See the integration guide for details and the updated ISO.gs library for examples.
Provides utility functions for generating payloads for ISO messages.

      public static ISOPayloadGenerator instance()

    • generateBoatPayload

      public String generateBoatPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an ISO message payload containing the PropertyLossInfo/Watercraft aggregate, typically used for exposures where a boat is involved

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      an ISO message payload for a vehicle exposure

    • generateEditableBoatPayload

      public ISOEditableRequest generateEditableBoatPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an editable ISO message payload containing the PropertyLossInfo/Watercraft aggregate, typically used for exposures where a boat is involved

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      an editable ISO message payload for a vehicle exposure

    • generateInjuryPayload

      public String generateInjuryPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths, String description, TypeKey bodyPart)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an ISO message payload containing the ClaimsParty/ClaimsInjuredInfo aggregate, typically used for injury related and 3rd party property exposures

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      description - description of the injury
      bodyPart - type key describing body part (unfortunately we have duplicate type lists for body parts)
      Returns:
      an ISO message payload for an injury exposure

    • generateEditableInjuryPayload

      public ISOEditableRequest generateEditableInjuryPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths, String description, TypeKey bodyPart)

      description - description of the injury
      bodyPart - type key describing body part (unfortunately we have duplicate type lists for body parts)
      Returns:
      editable ISO message payload for an injury exposure

    • generateTheftPayload

      public String generateTheftPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths, boolean isSummary)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an ISO message payload containing the PropertyLossInfo/PropertySchedule aggregate, typically used for theft exposures

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      isSummary - used to populate the PropertySchedule IsSummaryInd field
      Returns:
      an ISO message payload for a theft exposure

    • generateWorkersCompPayload

      public String generateWorkersCompPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths, String description, TypeKey bodyPart)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an ISO message payload for a workers comp exposure containing the ClaimsParty/ClaimsInjuredInfo aggregate and using the claim's claimant rather than looking for a claimant on the exposure.

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      description - description of the injury
      bodyPart - type key describing body part (unfortunately we have duplicate type lists for body parts)
      Returns:
      an ISO message payload for a workers comp exposure

    • generateEditableWorkersCompPayload

      public ISOEditableRequest generateEditableWorkersCompPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths, String description, TypeKey bodyPart)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an editable ISO message payload for a workers comp exposure containing the ClaimsParty/ClaimsInjuredInfo aggregate and using the claim's claimant rather than looking for a claimant on the exposure.

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      description - description of the injury
      bodyPart - type key describing body part (unfortunately we have duplicate type lists for body parts)
      Returns:
      an editable ISO message payload for a workers comp exposure

    • generateUpdateKeyFieldsPayload

      public String generateUpdateKeyFieldsPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      If any of the key ISO fields of the given exposure have changed, return a special "update key fields" payload to be sent to ISO. Otherwise return null, indicating that no update key fields message should be sent.
      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      update key fields payload

    • generateEditableUpdateKeyFieldsPayload

      public ISOEditableRequest generateEditableUpdateKeyFieldsPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      If any of the key ISO fields of the given exposure have changed, return a special "update key fields" payload to be sent to ISO. Otherwise return null, indicating that no update key fields message should be sent.
      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      an editable "update key fields" payload

    • generateUntypedPayload

      public String generateUntypedPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an ISO message payload for a exposure but do no fill out any of the type specific fields automatically; instead rely on the XPaths to do it. Use this method with care - it should only be used if one of the standard types doesn't fit (for example if all the data relevant to ISO is in extension fields).

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      an untyped message payload

    • generateEditableUntypedPayload

      public ISOEditableRequest generateEditableUntypedPayload(Exposure exposure, String[] xPaths)
      Deprecated.
      Generate an editable ISO message payload for a exposure but do no fill out any of the type specific fields automatically; instead rely on the XPaths to do it. Use this method with care - it should only be used if one of the standard types doesn't fit (for example if all the data relevant to ISO is in extension fields).

      Intended for use by ISO rules

      Parameters:
      exposure - the exposure that has become valid or changed
      xPaths - paths to apply to the XML after it is generated
      Returns:
      an editable untyped message payload

    • getTypeCodeMapper

      public TypecodeMapper getTypeCodeMapper()
      Deprecated.
      Returns:
      the type code mapper used for generating payloads.
